titles.title: Native Histories and Cultures Education Act of 2023
Native Histories and Cultures Education Act of 2023
A bill to develop and disseminate accurate, relevant, and accessible resources to promote understanding about Native American and Tribal Histories.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary:
Native Histories and Cultures Education Act of 2023
This bill directs the National Museum of the American Indian to develop a nationally focused curriculum on Native histories and cultures. The museum must also award grants to partnerships of state educational agencies and Indian tribes, tribal organizations, or Native Hawaiian educational organizations to (1) use the curriculum to develop and plan Native histories and cultures education programs that are local and regionally specific, and (2) implement these programs in elementary and secondary schools.
